attributes.action: Media Coverage Of Our Armed Forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would Like To Ask The Goverment Why Our News/Media Is Dominated, For Example, Israeli Vs Hamas We Know The Reasons Behind It, The Aim,How Many Deaths/Injured,The Bombings,The Discussions Etc. Yet How Much Do we Know About Afghanistan, What Is Going on, Our Aim,Our Injured, If One of Our Boys/Girls Gets Killed They get A Paragraph In the News Paper Or A 30 Second Slot On The News channel. It Needs To Change!!!

rejection.details: Pls redraft and resubmit with a title that requests specific action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
